name: Hieratic Seal From the Ashes
text: Once per opponent's turn: You can send 1 "Hieratic" monster from your Deck to your GY. Once per turn, during your turn: You can target 1 of your banished "Hieratic" monsters; return that target to the GY. If this face-up card on the field is sent to the GY: Target 1 "Hieratic" monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.
